recipesJson.name: 3 2 1 Ambrosia mother fucker!!!
recipesJson.author: FuriousMixer
recipesJson.description: Nice simple little 3,2,1 custard recipe that yes you guessed it,tastes pretty much like good old trusty ambrosia custard/pudding. Iâ€™m glad Iâ€™ve made this recipe and can vape it as every time I eat ambrosia I get the bum squirts!! ğŸ’© ğŸ˜–ğŸ¥´ I use 0.50% cap super sweet and vape this straight after a 2 hour run in the ultrasonic.  Bon appetit  ğŸ‘ŒğŸ»

reviews.text: I am a big fan of INW Custard.  I will try game changer but I cannot get past the odd taste of CAP Vanilla Custard v1.  For me this brings a flavor unlike anything I have had.  I mix it again and again.  I always have some form of this in my personal stash.  Great simple recipe.  Thank you. I give it a 5 because it's unique in it's own way and is exactly what it says it is.

For 6% flavor you can't go wrong with this custard.   11/22/19 Update.   I had another taste and didn't do much for me.  But that could be due to the fact that I dont' care for INW Custard.  If you like INW Custard this shit may be gold.  If you  want the real deal custard go mix up Game Changer by furiosmixer.
After reading the description I almost didn't mix this lol, but i am glad i did turned out to be quite flavorful and tasty thanks for sharing.
Simple but delicious! Thank you for sharing
